# qualityLevel

**Instance Property**

A value that indicates how the request balances accuracy and performance.

## Declaration

```swift
final var qualityLevel: GeneratePersonSegmentationRequest.QualityLevel { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default is [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/GeneratePersonSegmentationRequest/QualityLevel-swift.enum/accurate].

## Configuring a request

- **GeneratePersonSegmentationRequest.QualityLevel**: Constants that define the levels of quality for a person-segmentation request.
- **outputPixelFormatType**: The desired pixel format of the observation.
- **supportedOutputPixelFormats**: The collection of supported pixel format types.
